name: Human Vs Evil
description:
Human Vs Evil It is a tower defense game that tells the story of species from outer space controlling Crix's home planet. Crix calls on the remaining humans to counterattack. Can Crix regain the home planet? Everything is in your hands.

Full game with five chapters,
each world has its own unique appearance, effects, units, enemies etc...


What's news in Chapter 1
1. Easy & Hard Mode (35 levels & 35 levels)
2. Thirty units you can buy in Chapter 1
3. Six skills you can unlock
